Lincoln 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Lincoln vehicles. Curious to know what Lincoln model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Lincoln 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Lincoln models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Lincoln model changed across years or compare between different models of the Lincoln family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Lincoln 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest Lincoln cars

Lincoln MKZ 0-60 4.8 - 7.1 sec 1/4 mile 13.4 @ 105 - 15.3 @ 91 mph
Lincoln Continental 0-60 5 - 5.8 sec 1/4 mile 13.5 @ 104 - 14 @ 100 mph
Lincoln MKS 0-60 5.2 - 6.6 sec 1/4 mile 13.8 @ 101 - 15.1 @ 92 mph
Lincoln MKX 0-60 5.9 - 7.7 sec 1/4 mile 14.5 @ 98 - 15.9 @ 91 mph
Lincoln MKT 0-60 6.1 - 7.4 sec 1/4 mile 14.6 @ 96 - 15.8 @ 89 mph
Lincoln Navigator 0-60 6.2 - 9.4 sec 1/4 mile 14.9 @ 93 - 17.1 @ 80 mph
Lincoln LS 0-60 6.3 - 7.55 sec 1/4 mile 14.8 @ 96 - 17.3 @ 93 mph
Lincoln Town Car 0-60 6.7 - 9.45 sec 1/4 mile 15.2 @ 85 - 17.7 @ 85 mph
Lincoln Aviator 0-60 6.8 - 7.6 sec 1/4 mile 15.3 @ 87 - 16 @ 85 mph
Lincoln MKC 0-60 6.8 - 7.5 sec 1/4 mile 15 @ 92 - 15.7 @ 89 mph
Lincoln Zephyr 0-60 6.8 sec 1/4 mile 15.2 @ 95 mph
Lincoln Navigator L 0-60 7.3 - 8.8 sec 1/4 mile 15.4 @ 91 - 16.9 @ 80 mph
Lincoln Mark LT 0-60 7.7 - 8.4 sec 1/4 mile 15.5 @ 89 - 16.2 @ 87 mph
Lincoln Blackwood 0-60 8.17 sec 1/4 mile 17.1 @ 0 mph
Lincoln MKZ Hybrid 0-60 8.7 - 11.5 sec 1/4 mile 16.6 @ 85 - 20 @ 85 mph
